00038 #ifndef _PLT_MEDIA_CACHE_H_
00039 #define _PLT_MEDIA_CACHE_H_
00040 
00041 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00042 |   includes
00043 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00044 #include "Neptune.h"
00045 
00046 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00047 |   PLT_MediaCache
00048 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00053 template <typename T, typename U>
00054 class PLT_MediaCache
00055 {
00056 public:
00057     typedef typename NPT_Map<NPT_String,T>::Entry ElementEntry;
00058     typedef typename NPT_List<ElementEntry*>::Iterator ElementIterator;
00059 
00060     PLT_MediaCache<T,U>() {}
00061     virtual ~PLT_MediaCache<T,U>() {}
00062 
00063     NPT_Result Put(const char* root, const char* key, T& value, U* tag = NULL);
00064     NPT_Result Get(const char* root, const char* key, T& value, U* tag = NULL);
00065     NPT_Result Clear(const char* root, const char* key);
00066     NPT_Result Clear(const char* root = NULL);
00067 
00068 private:
00069     // methods
00070     NPT_String GenerateKey(const char* root, const char* key);
00071 
00072 private:
00073     // members
00074     NPT_Mutex              m_Mutex;
00075     NPT_Map<NPT_String, T> m_Items;
00076     NPT_Map<NPT_String, U> m_Tags;
00077 };
00078 
00079 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00080 |   PLT_MediaCache::GenerateKey
00081 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00082 template <typename T, typename U>
00083 inline
00084 NPT_String
00085 PLT_MediaCache<T,U>::GenerateKey(const char* root, const char* key)
00086 {
00087     // TODO: There could be collision
00088     NPT_String result = root;
00089     result += "/";
00090     result += key;
00091     return result;
00092 }
00093 
00094 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00095 |   PLT_MediaCache::Put
00096 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00097 template <typename T, typename U>
00098 inline
00099 NPT_Result
00100 PLT_MediaCache<T,U>::Put(const char* root,
00101                        const char* key, 
00102                        T&          value,
00103                        U*          tag)
00104 {
00105     NPT_AutoLock lock(m_Mutex);
00106 
00107     NPT_String fullkey = GenerateKey(root, key);
00108     if (fullkey.GetLength() == 0) return NPT_ERROR_INVALID_PARAMETERS;
00109 
00110     m_Items.Erase(fullkey);
00111     NPT_CHECK(m_Items.Put(fullkey, value));
00112     
00113     if (tag) NPT_CHECK(m_Tags.Put(fullkey, *tag));
00114     
00115     return NPT_SUCCESS;
00116 }
00117 
00118 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00119 |   PLT_MediaCache::Get
00120 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00121 template <typename T, typename U>
00122 inline
00123 NPT_Result
00124 PLT_MediaCache<T,U>::Get(const char* root,
00125                        const char* key, 
00126                        T&          value,
00127                        U*          tag /* = NULL */)
00128 {
00129     NPT_AutoLock lock(m_Mutex);
00130 
00131     NPT_String fullkey = GenerateKey(root, key);
00132     if (fullkey.GetLength() == 0) return NPT_ERROR_INVALID_PARAMETERS;
00133     
00134     T* _value = NULL;
00135     NPT_CHECK(m_Items.Get(fullkey, _value));
00136     
00137     U* _tag;
00138     if (tag) {
00139         m_Tags.Get(fullkey, _tag);
00140         if (_tag) *tag = *_tag;
00141     }
00142 
00143     value = *_value;
00144     return NPT_SUCCESS;
00145 }
00146 
00147 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00148 |   PLT_MediaCache::Clear
00149 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00150 template <typename T, typename U>
00151 inline
00152 NPT_Result 
00153 PLT_MediaCache<T,U>::Clear(const char* root, const char* key) 
00154 {
00155     NPT_AutoLock lock(m_Mutex);
00156 
00157     NPT_String fullkey = GenerateKey(root, key);
00158     if (fullkey.GetLength() == 0) return NPT_ERROR_INVALID_PARAMETERS;
00159 
00160     ElementIterator entries = m_Items.GetEntries().GetFirstItem();
00161     ElementIterator entry;
00162     while (entries) {
00163         entry = entries++;
00164         if ((*entry)->GetKey() == (fullkey)) {
00165             m_Items.Erase(fullkey);
00166             m_Tags.Erase(fullkey);
00167             return NPT_SUCCESS;
00168         }
00169     }
00170 
00171     return NPT_ERROR_NO_SUCH_ITEM;
00172 }
00173 
00174 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00175 |   PLT_MediaCache::Clear
00176 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00177 template <typename T, typename U>
00178 inline
00179 NPT_Result
00180 PLT_MediaCache<T,U>::Clear(const char* root)
00181 {
00182     NPT_AutoLock lock(m_Mutex);
00183 
00184     if (!root || root[0]=='\0') 
00185         return m_Items.Clear();
00186 
00187     NPT_String key = GenerateKey(root, "");
00188     ElementIterator entries = m_Items.GetEntries().GetFirstItem();
00189     ElementIterator entry;
00190     while (entries) {
00191         entry = entries++;
00192         NPT_String entry_key = (*entry)->GetKey();
00193         if (entry_key.StartsWith(key)) {
00194             m_Items.Erase(entry_key);
00195             m_Tags.Erase(entry_key);
00196         }
00197     }
00198 
00199     return NPT_SUCCESS;
00200 }
00201 
00202 #endif /* _PLT_MEDIA_CACHE_H_ */
